Title: Petrolejové lampy
Writer: Jaroslav Havlícek (novel), Meir Dohnal, Juraj Herz, Václav Sasek
Actors: Iva Janzurová, Petr Cepek, Marie Rosulková, Ota Sklencka
Plot: In 1900, Stepha, the vivacious 30 year old daughter of a wealthy couple, agrees to marry her cousin Paul, who has accumulated large debts as an Austrian army officer. Paul refuses to work ...
